com.facebook.buck.sandbox

Class AbstractSandboxConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.sandbox.AbstractSandboxConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigView<BuckConfig>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SandboxConfig

    @Value.Immutable(builder=false,
                 copy=false)
public abstract class AbstractSandboxConfig
extends Object
implements ConfigView<BuckConfig>
    Config section responsible for sandbox features.

    • Method Detail

      • isGenruleSandboxEnabled

        public boolean isGenruleSandboxEnabled()
        Whether `genrule` should use sandboxing.

        `genrule` sandboxing can be enabled or disabled for particular targets using enable_sandbox parameter.

        Whether sandboxing is enabled on Darwin (OS X).
